reviewText: BACHELOR PARTY BLOWOUT VOLUME 1 is what you might suppose a bachelor party to look like, with 2 ladies stripping completely naked then dancing around among a bunch of guys, and also giving some of the guys lap dances. Both ladies are very attractive, though I don't believe their names are ever given. The camerawork, picture quality, and lighting are quite good considering the circumstances, although occasionally the image is a bit wobbly and meandering. The aspect ratio is 1.33:1. The bachelor party segment runs about 30 minutes, which is rather short, then the DVD ends with the main dancer (the one with dark hair on the cover) alone in an 18-minute-long sexy bathtub scene. This is fun but it does not have a lot to do with a bachelor party! Also, although this is called "Volume 1," I could not find any other volumes of it on Amazon. Another DVD of this type, although I'm not sure if it's the same as my copy so I'm NOT endorsing it, is World's Wildest Bachelor Parties.
